original_text: The house of Joseph also went up against Bethel, and the Lord was with them.
korean_text: 요셉 가문도 벧엘을 치러 올라가니 여호와께서 그와 함께 하시니라

sentences.original_text: The house of Joseph also went up against Bethel
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉 지파도 또한 베델을 치러 올라갔고

sentences.original_text: and the Lord was with them.
